verbs.description: [V: ronaldo] defends himself against rape accusation speaking publicly for the first time since being accused of rape cristiano ronaldo defended himself against the allegation and said monday he is confident the truth will come out in the case the soccer superstar has been accused of rape in the united states kathryn mayorga filed a civil lawsuit last month in nevada claiming ronaldo raped her in his las vegas hotel room in 2009 police also reopened an investigation into the allegation at her request ronaldo attorney peter s christiansen issued a statement on oct 10 denying wrongdoing by his client manchester united fc manchester united united las vegas madrid ronaldo champions league united states peter s christiansen kathryn mayorga rape peter s christiansen manchester soccer cristiano ronaldo
